q: '' Reflecting on the Arizona shootings that killed six people and badly wounded John McCain Rep. Gabrielle Giffords , Colin Powell said he was dismayed by the harsh tenor of political debate that some have said may have contributed to the attack. There has crept in our society and our public dialogue, a coarseness, a nastiness, an attack of people who don't share the same views as you do, he said. ''All sorts of nastiness. And it is not just politicians who are doing this to each other, and, frankly, politics has always been a contact sport in this country. but with

Current CEO Eric Schmidt will be executive chairman, and co-founder Sergey Brin will remain co-founder, devoting ''his time and energy to strategic projects,'' Eric Schmidt wrote in a blog post.
